Detailed Description

Obsolete - all sound classes from AddOns/MultiMedia have been replaced by a new audio concept. Use the AudioDeviceManager instead for playing sounds.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Constructs an AudioContext for the desired audio device.

void AudioContext::SetAudioMode (  Audio::AudioMode  mode  ) 
 

Sets the audio mode for all devices. Default mode is normal mode.

See also:
Audio::AudioMode

void AudioContext::SetMute (  BOOLEAN  mute  ) 
 

TRUE turns the current device off, FALSE turns it on.

void AudioContext::SetPriority (  Audio::AudioPriority  priority  )  [inline]
 

Sets the priority a sound should be played with. Default priority is low priority.

See also:
